document.full_text: sonny bill williams is a talented rugby player but insists on being a boxer, too -- and he tends to cause a stir wherever he goes.
document.title: rugby: new zealand's hard-hitter, on the rugby field and in the ring
lines_and_colors: sonny bill williams is a talented rugby player but insists on being a boxer, too -- and he tends to cause a stir wherever he goes.
